posts.html:
Men come to Barber Avenue not only to get a great hair cut, but also to relax and have fun. It's a place to talk about your projets, your ambitions and to connect with other ambitious person like you.

Telephone: 514-401-1111

Stylists

Description Price
Shaving $15
Mens hair cut $35
Shampoo $10
15 min head message $40
Organic hair color $70
Young boys (15 y/o or less) $20

Products

Product Cost
Black top pomade $25
Fiber pomade $20
Free form cream $24
Matte pomade paste $24

It's monday night football and you don't want to miss it. No problem. Come watching it with us. We even give away some chicken wings!


Show me proofs
posts.plaintext:
Men come to Barber Avenue not only to get a great hair cut, but also to relax
and have fun. It's a place to talk about your projets, your ambitions and to
connect with other ambitious person like you.

Telephone: 514-401-1111

Stylists
DescriptionPriceShaving$15Mens hair cut$35Shampoo$1015 min head message$40
Organic hair color$70Young boys (15 y/o or less)$20

Products
ProductCostBlack top pomade$25Fiber pomade$20Free form cream$24Matte pomade
paste$24





It's monday night football  and you don't want to miss it. No problem. Come
watching it with us. We even give away some chicken wings!



 Show me proofs
[/news/proof/]

posts.title: Proof
posts.mobiledoc:
{"version":"0.3.1","markups":[],"atoms":[],"cards":[["card-markdown",{"cardName":"card-markdown","markdown":"This is our **wall of fame**! If you don't know how we roll, we believe this is the proof of our commitment to make you look like a gentleman. Happy clients are everything to us. Without you guys we would be living on the street (or in our Mom's basement). Thank you so much for trusting us over all those years.
![portfolio_109](/news/content/images/2017/08/portfolio_109.jpg) > We serve [Peter Volks](https://twitter.com/askpascalandy) since June 2015. He change the world by beeing a **Creative Director** at Cossette Communication in Montréal.

![portfolio_102](/news/content/images/2017/08/portfolio_102.jpg) > We serve [Lilian Pierrick](https://twitter.com/askpascalandy) since April 2014. He change the world by beeing a **Software Engineer** at Ubisoft in Montréal.

![portfolio_103](/news/content/images/2017/08/portfolio_103.jpg) > We serve [Hugues Lambert](https://twitter.com/askpascalandy) since January 2016. He change the world by beeing a **Business Analyst** at Bank of Montréal (guess where).

![portfolio_104](/news/content/images/2017/08/portfolio_104.jpg) > We serve [Renard Thibault](https://twitter.com/askpascalandy) since September 2014. He change the world by beeing a **Chef and owner** at La Banquise in Montréal.

![portfolio_105](/news/content/images/2017/08/portfolio_105.jpg) > We serve [Juste Achille](https://twitter.com/askpascalandy) since October 2015. He change the world by beeing a **Lead singer** in the band The Rock Habilies from Montréal.

![portfolio_107](/news/content/images/2017/08/portfolio_107.jpg) > We serve [Jacky Josselin](https://twitter.com/askpascalandy) since Fabruary 2014. He change the world by beeing a **Carpenter** at Depuis Construction in Laval.

![portfolio_106](/news/content/images/2017/08/portfolio_106.jpg) > We serve [Aldéric Alex](https://twitter.com/askpascalandy) since November 2012. He change the world by beeing a **3D artist** at Gameloft in Montréal.

![portfolio_108](/news/content/images/2017/08/portfolio_108.jpg) > We serve [Edgard Gérard](https://twitter.com/askpascalandy) since Spetember 2014. He change the world by beeing a **Painter** Edgard Colors in Montréal.

![portfolio_111](/news/content/images/2017/08/portfolio_111.jpg) > We serve [David Humbert](https://twitter.com/askpascalandy) since March 2015. He change the world by beeing a **Accountant** at Pratt & Whitney in Montréal.

![portfolio_110](/news/content/images/2017/08/portfolio_110.jpg) > We serve [Matthew Dimitri](https://twitter.com/askpascalandy) since November 2013. He change the world by beeing a **Financial Anaylyst** at Bombardier in Montréal.

Who are you guys?


"}]],"sections":[[10,0]]}
posts.html:
This is our wall of fame! If you don't know how we roll, we believe this is the proof of our commitment to make you look like a gentleman.

Happy clients are everything to us. Without you guys we would be living on the street (or in our Mom's basement). Thank you so much for trusting us over all those years.


We serve Peter Volks since June 2015. He change the world by beeing a Creative Director at Cossette Communication in Montréal.




We serve Lilian Pierrick since April 2014. He change the world by beeing a Software Engineer at Ubisoft in Montréal.



We serve Hugues Lambert since January 2016. He change the world by beeing a Business Analyst at Bank of Montréal (guess where).



We serve Renard Thibault since September 2014. He change the world by beeing a Chef and owner at La Banquise in Montréal.



We serve Juste Achille since October 2015. He change the world by beeing a Lead singer in the band The Rock Habilies from Montréal.



We serve Jacky Josselin since Fabruary 2014. He change the world by beeing a Carpenter at Depuis Construction in Laval.



We serve Aldéric Alex since November 2012. He change the world by beeing a 3D artist at Gameloft in Montréal.



We serve Edgard Gérard since Spetember 2014. He change the world by beeing a Painter Edgard Colors in Montréal.



We serve David Humbert since March 2015. He change the world by beeing a Accountant at Pratt & Whitney in Montréal.



We serve Matthew Dimitri since November 2013. He change the world by beeing a Financial Anaylyst at Bombardier in Montréal.


Who are you guys?

posts.title: About Us
posts.mobiledoc:
{"version":"0.3.1","markups":[],"atoms":[],"cards":[["card-markdown",{"cardName":"card-markdown","markdown":"We are artist at heart. Not only we are obsessed about perfecting our craft but we aim to be happy in our personal life as well. Frank O'Neil and I, Mark Jolier, first meet in high school about +/- 20 years ago. Things couldn't be better for us. Frank just received a big promotion at work, and has a wonderful marriage with his beautiful wife, Sharon. However, into this idyllic world steps Lisa, a temporary worker at Derek's office. Lisa begins to stalk Derek, jeopardizing all he holds dear. That's when we decided to start our own affair and we never looked back. Call us at 514-401-2927 or send us an [email](/news/contact-us/). ![about-us-header-1](/news/content/images/2017/10/about-us-header-1.jpg)

Book your next appointment


"}]],"sections":[[10,0]]}
posts.html:
We are artist at heart. Not only we are obsessed about perfecting our craft but we aim to be happy in our personal life as well.

Frank O'Neil and I, Mark Jolier, first meet in high school about +/- 20 years ago. Things couldn't be better for us. Frank just received a big promotion at work, and has a wonderful marriage with his beautiful wife, Sharon. However, into this idyllic world steps Lisa, a temporary worker at Derek's office. Lisa begins to stalk Derek, jeopardizing all he holds dear.

That's when we decided to start our own affair and we never looked back.

Call us at 514-401-2927 or send us an email.


Book your next appointment
posts.plaintext:
We are artist at heart. Not only we are obsessed about perfecting our craft but
we aim to be happy in our personal life as well.

Frank O'Neil and I, Mark Jolier, first meet in high school about +/- 20 years
ago. Things couldn't be better for us. Frank just received a big promotion at
work, and has a wonderful marriage with his beautiful wife, Sharon. However,
into this idyllic world steps Lisa, a temporary worker at Derek's office. Lisa
begins to stalk Derek, jeopardizing all he holds dear.

That's when we decided to start our own affair and we never looked back.

Call us at 514-401-2927 or send us an email [/news/contact-us/].





 Book your next appointment
[/news/book-your-next-appointment/]

posts.title: Our blog is on it's way

{"version":"0.3.1","markups":[],"atoms":[],"cards":[["card-markdown",{"cardName":"card-markdown","markdown":"We know we should blog about what we do, share our vision of the world and reflect on stuff but... we are currently too busy serving you. Book your next appointment


"}]],"sections":[[10,0]]}
posts.html:
We know we should blog about what we do, share our vision of the world and reflect on stuff but... we are currently too busy serving you.

Well actually... if you are (or if you know) a great writter, please let us know, we want to meet you! Ask Frank about this!


Book your next appointment
posts.plaintext:
We know we should blog about what we do, share our vision of the world and
reflect on stuff but... we are currently too busy serving you.

Well actually... if you are (or if you know) a great writter, please let us
know, we want to meet you! Ask Frank about this!



 Book your next appointment
[/news/book-your-next-appointment/]

posts.html:
We’re so glad we got married to haircuts, fun, and creative style five years ago. And you’re invited. Come to our month-long April Anniversary party; we’ll have new ideas, surprises, and offers.

This text is used as a placeholder or a tk note. Words that will follow won't make any sense and this is fine. At the moment, the goal is to build a structure for our site.

It started slowly

Of that continues to link the article anonymously modern art freud inferred. Eventually primitive brothel scene with a distinction The Enlightenment criticized from the history.

From understanding of the day worked either through 1912 analytic. And criticised Vasari's cult of a broader term that the date. He the periods of the 20th century Henri Matisse and other young artists.

See ya soon!


Book your next appointment
posts.plaintext:
We’re so glad we got married to haircuts, fun, and creative style five years
ago. And you’re invited. Come to our month-long April Anniversary party; we’ll
have new ideas, surprises, and offers.

This text is used as a placeholder or a tk note. Words that will follow won't
make any sense and this is fine. At the moment, the goal is to build a structure
for our site.

It started slowly
Of that continues to link the article anonymously modern art freud inferred.
Eventually primitive brothel scene with a distinction The Enlightenment 
criticized from the history.

From understanding of the day worked either through 1912 analytic. And
criticised Vasari's cult of a broader term that the date. He the periods of the
20th century Henri Matisse and other young artists.

See ya soon!



 Book your next appointment
[/news/book-your-next-appointment/]

--- ## Preformatted Text Typographically, preformatted text is not the same thing as code. Sometimes, a faithful execution of the text requires preformatted text that may not have anything to do with code. Most browsers use Courier and that’s a good default — with one slight adjustment, Courier 10 Pitch over regular Courier for Linux users. ### Code Code can be presented inline, like <?php bloginfo('stylesheet_url'); ?>, or within a <pre> block. Because we have more specific typographic needs for code, we’ll specify Consolas and Monaco ahead of the browser-defined monospace font. #container { float: left; margin: 0 -240px 0 0; width: 100%; } --- ## Blockquotes Let’s keep it simple. Italics are good to help set it off from the body text. Be sure to style the citation. > Good afternoon, gentlemen. I am a HAL 9000 computer. I became operational at the H.A.L. plant in Urbana, Illinois on the 12th of January 1992. My instructor was Mr. Langley, and he taught me to sing a song. If you’d like to hear it I can sing it for you. — [HAL 9000](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HAL_9000) And here’s a bit of trailing text. --- ## Text-level semantics The a element example The abbr element and abbr element with title examples The b element example The cite element example The code element example The del element example The dfn element and dfn element with title examples The em element example The i element example The ins element example The kbd element example The mark element example The q element inside a q element example The s element example The samp element example The small element example The span element example The strong element example The sub element example The sup element example The var element example The u element example --- ## Embeds Sometimes all you want to do is embed a little love from another location and set your post alive. ### Youtube and Vimeo Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. posts.html:
Below is just about everything you can do when writing in markdown. It's a good palce to back back and see how to format stuff for your own content

Heading 1

Heading 2

Heading 3

Heading 4

Heading 5
Heading 6

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, test link adipiscing elit. This is strong. Nullam dignissim convallis est. Quisque aliquam. This is emphasized. Donec faucibus. Nunc iaculis suscipit dui. 53 = 125. Water is H2O. Nam sit amet sem. Aliquam libero nisi, imperdiet at, tincidunt nec, gravida vehicula, nisl. The New York Times (That’s a citation). Underline. Maecenas ornare tortor. Donec sed tellus eget sapien fringilla nonummy. Mauris a ante. Suspendisse quam sem, consequat at, commodo vitae, feugiat in, nunc. Morbi imperdiet augue quis tellus.

HTML and CSS are our tools. Mauris a ante. Suspendisse quam sem, consequat at, commodo vitae, feugiat in, nunc. Morbi imperdiet augue quis tellus. Praesent mattis, massa quis luctus fermentum, turpis mi volutpat justo, eu volutpat enim diam eget metus. To copy a file type COPY filename. Dinner’s at 5:00. Let’s make that 7. This text has been struck.

Media

Image (standard image size)

Image full image size

Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur.

List Types

Ordered List

  1. List Item 1
  2. List Item 2
  3. Nested list item A
  4. Nested list item B
  5. List Item 3

Unordered List

  • List Item 1
  • List Item 2
  • Nested list item A
  • Nested list item B
  • List Item 3

Table

Table Header 1 Table Header 2 Table Header 3
Division 1 Division 2 Division 3
Division 1 Division 2 Division 3
Division 1 Division 2 Division 3

Preformatted Text

Typographically, preformatted text is not the same thing as code. Sometimes, a faithful execution of the text requires preformatted text that may not have anything to do with code. Most browsers use Courier and that’s a good default — with one slight adjustment, Courier 10 Pitch over regular Courier for Linux users.

Code

Code can be presented inline, like <?php bloginfo('stylesheet_url'); ?>, or within a <pre> block. Because we have more specific typographic needs for code, we’ll specify Consolas and Monaco ahead of the browser-defined monospace font.

#container {
    float: left;
    margin: 0 -240px 0 0;
    width: 100%;
}

Blockquotes

Let’s keep it simple. Italics are good to help set it off from the body text. Be sure to style the citation.

Good afternoon, gentlemen. I am a HAL 9000 computer. I became operational at the H.A.L. plant in Urbana, Illinois on the 12th of January 1992. My instructor was Mr. Langley, and he taught me to sing a song. If you’d like to hear it I can sing it for you. — HAL 9000

And here’s a bit of trailing text.

Text-level semantics

The a element example
The abbr element and abbr element with title examples
The b element example
The cite element example
The code element example
The del element example
The dfn element and dfn element with title examples
The em element example
The i element example
The ins element example
The kbd element example
The mark element example
The q element inside a q element example
The s element example
The samp element example
The small element example
The span element example
The strong element example
The sub element example
The sup element example
The var element example
The u element example

Embeds

Sometimes all you want to do is embed a little love from another location and set your post alive.

Youtube and Vimeo

Culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

Slides

Mobile Is Eating the World (2016) from a16z

Culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

Audio

Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

Code

# Create Swarm
docker swarm init --advertise-addr $(hostname -i); docker node ls;
# Install common apps
apk update && apk upgrade && apk add nano curl bash git wget unzip ca-certificates;

Isn't it beautiful?

Code
Code can be presented inline, like <?php bloginfo('stylesheet_url'); ?>, or
within a <pre>  block. Because we have more specific typographic needs for code,
we’ll specify Consolas and Monaco ahead of the browser-defined monospace font.

#container {
    float: left;
    margin: 0 -240px 0 0;
    width: 100%;
}



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Blockquotes
Let’s keep it simple. Italics are good to help set it off from the body text. Be
sure to style the citation.

Good afternoon, gentlemen. I am a HAL 9000 computer. I became operational at the
H.A.L. plant in Urbana, Illinois on the 12th of January 1992. My instructor was
Mr. Langley, and he taught me to sing a song. If you’d like to hear it I can
sing it for you. — HAL 9000 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HAL_9000]

And here’s a bit of trailing text.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Embeds
Sometimes all you want to do is embed a little love from another location and
set your post alive.

posts.html:
We love to share our work on Instagram and Pinterest. If you prefer to send us an email, this is the place to do it.

Appointment

Please book your next appointment here!

posts.plaintext:
We love to share our work on Instagram
[https://www.instagram.com/themensgroomer/]  and Pinterest. If you prefer to
send us an email, this is the place to do it.

Appointment
Please book your next appointment here [/news/book-your-next-appointment/]!

Social networks
 *   Twitter [https://twitter.com/askpascalandy]
 *   Facebook [https://www.facebook.com/askpascalandy]
 *   Linkedin [https://ca.linkedin.com/in/pascalnguyendeschenes].

Our location

Telephone: 514-401-2427

Canada H4G 3M6
